page.title: 02CLUBS IN SEASCALE
page.content: The clubs are Guides,Brownies, Scouts,Cubs,Beavers,Youth Club,Bad- minton and lots more.These include Dancing,Tennis,Roller-skating,Cricket, Gymnastics and Sailing. The{Golf Club}is on the{Golf}Links.It is for the people who come and play {golf}there and also for{non-playing members.There are several{national {golf tournaments}held there in Summer and golfers from all the country.The golf course itself is a full-size 18-hole course.Lots of children belong to Guides,Brownies,Scouts or Cubs.There is a Youth Club for older children in part of the school and there they play darts,pool and table tennis two evenings a week.There is a club for people who work at Sellafield where they have dances,discos and a bar.
